results.description: Joe Morrell talks about his rapid rise from non-league cast off to Wales international
results.shortTitle: Morrell: From Margate to marking Modric
results.title: Joe Morrell: From failed trials to crucial Wales qualifiers

results.description: Not wanted on loan at Margate, Joe Morrell is now thriving in League One and facing the World's best with Wales.
results.title: Joe Morrell: Midfielder's rapid rise from non-league cast off to Wales international

thumbnail.altText: Joe Morrell - From Margate to Modric

results.description: Watch highlights as Andre Dozzell's precise finish earned Ipswich Town an FA Cup first round replay against Lincoln City.
results.title: FA Cup: Ipswich Town 1-1 Lincoln City highlights

results.description: Lincoln miss a penalty at Portman Road but earn an FA Cup first-round replay against Ipswich Town.
results.title: Ipswich Town 1-1 Lincoln City

results.description: Listen to BBC local radio commentaries from 20 FA Cup first-round ties.
results.title: Listen: Commentaries from 20 FA Cup first-round ties

results.description: Lincoln are denied a first away win since August after a last-gasp Kwesi Appiah equaliser sees AFC Wimbledon secure a draw at Kingmeadow.
results.title: AFC Wimbledon 1-1 Lincoln City

results.description: Saturday's League One game between Lincoln City and Bolton Wanderers is postponed because of a waterlogged pitch.
results.title: Lincoln City P-P Bolton Wanderers

results.description: Kenny Jackett's Portsmouth win 1-0 at home to Lincoln City with a first-half strike from John Marquis.
results.title: Portsmouth 1-0 Lincoln City

results.description: Lincoln City hold out for a goalless draw against Shrewsbury Town after Imps defender Cian Bolger is shown a straight red card.
results.title: Lincoln City 0-0 Shrewsbury Town

results.description: Late strikes from Louis Reed and Ivan Toney ensure Peterborough see off Lincoln in a scoreline that flattered the hosts.
results.title: Peterborough United 2-0 Lincoln City

results.description: Tyler Walker scores twice as Lincoln beat Sunderland to increase the pressure on Black Cats boss Jack Ross.
results.title: Lincoln City 2-0 Sunderland

results.description: Michael Appleton's first game as Lincoln manager ends in a defeat by his former club Blackpool.
results.title: Blackpool 2-1 Lincoln City: Michael Appleton's Imps tenure starts with defeat

results.description: Nottingham Forest hang on to beat Stoke and go top of the Championship - relive the action as it happened.
results.shortTitle: Relive how Forest went top of the Championship
results.title: EFL: Stoke City 2-3 Nottingham Forest, Fulham 2-0 Wigan Athletic as it happened

results.description: Lincoln produce a woeful display in front of new manager Michael Appleton as they went down 6-0 to Oxford.
results.title: Lincoln City 0-6 Oxford United

results.description: League One club Lincoln City name former Oxford and Portsmouth boss Michael Appleton as their new manager.
results.title: Michael Appleton: Lincoln City name ex-Oxford United boss as manager

results.description: Newport County manager Michael Flynn staying with Exiles despite having talks over vacant Lincoln post.
results.title: Michael Flynn: Newport boss staying despite Lincoln talks

results.description: Harry Toffolo's late goal secures Lincoln City a share of the spoils in a draw at Rochdale.
results.title: Rochdale 1-1 Lincoln City

results.description: Lincoln begin life without Danny Cowley in underwhelming fashion with a home defeat by Bristol Rovers.
results.title: Lincoln City 0-1 Bristol Rovers

results.description: New Huddersfield Town boss Danny Cowley admits it would have been "safer" to stay at previous club Lincoln City.
results.title: Danny Cowley: Huddersfield Town boss 'wants to be challenged'

results.description: Championship strugglers Huddersfield Town appoint Lincoln City boss Danny Cowley as their new manager.
results.title: Danny Cowley: Huddersfield Town appoint Lincoln City boss as manager
